name: Metahamster
description: Metahamster ($MHAM) is a token launched on Binance Smart Chain with automatic liquidity pool growth and holder rewards through transaction taxation. Metahamster was created with the aim of building the metaverse which will bring together customers, and product owners. The metaverse will be created where the product owners can create their own stores and advertising campaigns, and customers can access these campaigns and products. A social platform, play-to-earn NFT games, and rewards will also be created for customers to spend time in this metaverse.
